trans-unit.target: Floor Effect: Blindness<tab>Accuracy of all party members is reduced.
Floor Effect: HP Penalty<tab>Maximum HP of all party members is reduced.
Floor Effect: Damage Penalty<tab>Damage dealt by all party members is reduced.
Floor Effect: Inability<tab>Use of abilities is prohibited for all party members.
Floor Effect: Haste<tab>Weaponskill recast time, spell recast time, and auto-attack delay for all party members are reduced.
Floor Effect: HP/MP Boost<tab>Maximum HP and MP of all party members are increased.
Floor Effect: Item Penalty<tab>Use of items (including dungeon-specific items) is prohibited for all party members.
Floor Effect: Sprint Penalty<tab>Use of the action Sprint is prohibited for all party members.
Floor Effect: Knockback Penalty<tab>Knockback and draw-in effects for both enemies and allies are disabled.
Floor Effect: Auto-heal Penalty<tab>HP regeneration for all party members is disabled.
Floor Effect: Gloom<tab>Enemy movement speed is increased. Enemies also deal more damage while taking less.
Floor Effect: Sprint<tab>Movement speed of all party members is increased.
Floor Effect: Magicite Penalty<tab>Use of magicite is prohibited for all party members.
Floor Effect: Demiclone Penalty<tab>Use of demiclones is prohibited for all party members.
